title: LeBron Dragging the Lakers to the Finish
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the Lakers grim situation with Anthony Davis' recent injury. Aaron Donald gets caught up in the post Super Bowl hype! PLUS, despite having the best record, why the Bulls are NOT contenders in the East. AND, why Aaron Rodgers and his fiancé splitting up, makes Jalen think he'll leave Green Bay.
